::Ramhorn::

Ramhorn looks from the shadows as Megatron places his bomb, then watches as 
Megatron walks to the bridge, hatred in his eyes. So, Megatron, you think 
you've won? Ramhorn thinks to himself as he hears the transmission.

Ramhorn walks calmy to the bomb, picking it up and throwing it through one of 
the crackes in the wall, throwing a charge at it. In a second, there is a 
giant boom as both bombs harmlessley explode in the forest.

Ramhorn taps his comm-link, setting it on all Maximal and Predacon 
frequencees as he heads to the Ark's bridge.

"Ladies and gentlemen," he says into his comm, remembering something he had 
heard somewhere before, "The bomb has left the building. Thank Smokescreen 
for making me patrol the Ark," he continues walking, taking out his 
heavy-fire rifle, "And may I remind you, Megatron, that without the Ark, 
Cybertron wouldn't be here right now. I have all the confidence in Autobot 
victory once the Decepticon headquarters at the time is destroyed. Either 
way, Megatron, you LOSE!" he puts the emphasis on his last word, reaching the 
bridge as he says it and immediately opening fire on Megatron with his rifle.
